devdoc.author: Aave
devdoc.details: It only contains one single function, needed as a hook on aToken and debtToken transfers.

handleAction(address,uint256,uint256).details: Called by the corresponding asset on transfer hook in order to update the rewards distribution.The units of `totalSupply` and `userBalance` should be the same.

params.totalSupply: The total supply of the asset prior to user balance change
params.user: The address of the user whose asset balance has changed
params.userBalance: The previous user balance prior to balance change

devdoc.title: IAaveIncentivesController

userdoc.notice: Defines the basic interface for an Aave Incentives Controller.
